column4: wow is there anyway to test to see if my nvidia drivers are installed
that wiki guide i got linked to really helped!!!
Nvidia screen did splash before ubuntu worked.... but how do i like check my fps in the termina; ?
so CarlFK_ what do i do in that dircytory
can u link me to that wiki page that tells me how to edit it ?
so how do i edit that file ?
that's why then.  you need to have superuser privs to be able to change that file
log out, key <ctrl><alt>F1 (gets you a console), log in, then "sudo invoke-rc.d gdm restart"
save it in a file in your home directory.  You'll be able to "cat <file>" when you're logged into the console
also, if X doesn't restart properly, typing "irc" will get you into a text irc client (irssi)
to type that gdm restart command
